title: Mast Upgrade: UK experiment could sweep aside fusion hurdle
description: Results from a UK experiment could help clear a hurdle to achieving commercial fusion power.

title: Letter from Africa: Why Queen of England has a throne in Nigeria
description: A myth among the Efik people is that one of their 19th Century kings married Queen Victoria.

title: Jerusalem's Sheikh Jarrah: The land dispute in the eye of a storm
description: Moves to evict Palestinians in a Jerusalem district helped ignite the recent Israel-Gaza conflict.

title: Rafael Nadal: The 'tough love' that shaped a 20-time Grand Slam champion
description: From 'scaredy cat' to a 'raging bull', Rafael Nadal's transformation into a true tennis great has a lot to do with one man in particular.

title: Dominic Cummings: His views on Covid and why it matters
description: Boris Johnson's former chief adviser has been a critic of the government since leaving his role.

title: From protests to 'patriots': Why China is crushing Hong Kong dissent
description: After clamping down on protests it has reformed elections - what does this mean for Hong Kong's future?

title: In pictures: Prince William and Kate visit Scotland
description: The Earl and Countess of Strathearn are attending a series of events during their trip north of the border.

title: John Cena: Fast and Furious star sorry over Taiwan remark backlash
description: John Cena posts a video apology in Chinese after describing Taiwan as a "country".

title: Emma Faulds murder: Former prison officer Ross Willox found guilty
description: Ross Willox killed Emma Faulds in his South Ayrshire home then dumped her naked body in the Galloway Forest.

title: Sri Lanka navy rescue crew following chemical fire on cargo ship
description: All 23 members of the Singaporean X-Press Pearl's crew were evacuated.

title: Sasha Johnson: Black Lives Matter activist shot by group of men
description: The Met Police says there was "nothing to suggest" that Sasha Johnson had been "targeted".

title: Covid: Eight Indian variant areas should avoid indoor gatherings
description: People are also asked not to go into or out of places hardest hit by the so-called Indian variant.

title: Conservative MP Rob Roberts told staffer to be 'less alluring'
description: Tory MP faces six-week suspension from Parliament after panel found he sexually harassed an employee.

title: England name provisional Euro 2020 squad: Ben White, Ben Godfrey, Aaron Ramsdale and Sam Johnstone in
description: Uncapped Ben White, Ben Godfrey, Sam Johnstone and Aaron Ramsdale are named in England's 33-man provisional Euro 2020 squad.

title: Street's power turned off for dramatic cat rescue
description: The mischievous moggy spent hours stuck at the top of a 10m electricity pole in Stow-on-the-Wold.

title: PM's burka comments gave impression of insensitivity - report
description: Boris Johnson launched a report in 2019 following complaints of Islamophobia in the party.

title: BBC to publish report on Bashir rehiring next week
description: The director general says there is "no doubt" recruiting Martin Bashir in 2016 was a "big mistake".

title: 'I had my political career taken away from me'
description: Four years on from Parliament's bullying and harassment scandal - how much has really changed?

title: Israel-Gaza conflict: Blinken promises US support for Gaza reconstruction
description: The US secretary of state wants to consolidate a ceasefire between Israel and Palestinian militants.

title: Texas to allow unlicensed carrying of handguns
description: A bill which further eases some of the loosest gun laws in the US is set to be approved.

title: Wolves close in on ex-Benfica boss Lage as next manager
description: Wolves close in on the appointment of Bruno Lage to succeed Nuno Espirito Santo as manager.

title: DR Congo's Goma volcano: Desperate search for children missing after eruption
description: Families were separated as people fled the lava after Saturday night's eruption of Mount Nyiragongo.

title: Rocco Morabito: Italian fugitive arrested in Brazil
description: Rocco Morabito, who has been wanted since the 1990s, escaped from a prison in Uruguay in 2019.

title: Belarus Ryanair flight diverted: Passengers describe panic on board
description: The plane changed course as it neared its destination leaving passengers shocked and confused.

title: EU agrees new Belarus sanctions after plane arrest
description: Belarusian airlines will be banned from EU skies after a flight was diverted and a journalist held.

title: Lawrence Okoye on NFL and return to discus: 'Physically I am superior now - American football aided me'
description: After nine years, seven American football teams and a lockdown spent throwing in a Hull park, London 2012 poster boy Lawrence Okoye is back in the circle and aiming for the world's elite.

title: Former Royal Marine makes a stand against anti-social behaviour
description: Sean Ivey fought back at youths plaguing his village but then saw his home burnt down.

title: Bruno Fernandes: Man Utd midfielder 'honoured' by Eric Cantona comparison
description: Bruno Fernandes speaks to BBC Sport as he prepares for Manchester United's Europa League final against Villarreal on Wednesday.

title: Can Osaka deliver on clay & grass to complete Grand Slam set?
description: Can Naomi Osaka win the French Open? BBC tennis correspondent Russell Fuller asks her that question and more.

title: The Papers: Brits flock to Spain as EU leaders condemn Belarus
description: Tuesday's front pages look back at Covid deaths in hospitals and ahead to further lockdown easing.
